description: Updates and persists a DataIntegrationAssociation resource.

parameters.name: DataIntegrationIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the DataIntegration.

parameters.name: DataIntegrationAssociationIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier. of the DataIntegrationAssociation resource.

parameters.name: ExecutionConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration for how the files should be pulled from the source. The mode for data import/export execution. OnDemandConfiguration (dict) --- The start and end time for data pull from the source. The start time for data pull from the source as an Unix/epoch string in milliseconds EndTime (string) --- The end time for data pull from the source as an Unix/epoch string in milliseconds ScheduleConfiguration (dict) --- The name of the data and how often it should be pulled from the source. FirstExecutionFrom (string) --- The start date for objects to import in the first flow run as an Unix/epoch timestamp in milliseconds or in ISO-8601 format. Object (string) --- The name of the object to pull from the data source. How often the data should be pulled from data source.

nested_params.name: ExecutionMode
nested_params.description: The mode for data import/export execution.

nested_params.name: OnDemandConfiguration
nested_params.description: The start and end time for data pull from the source.

nested_params.name: StartTime
nested_params.description: The start time for data pull from the source as an Unix/epoch string in milliseconds.

nested_params.name: EndTime
nested_params.description: The end time for data pull from the source as an Unix/epoch string in milliseconds.

nested_params.name: ScheduleConfiguration
nested_params.description: The name of the data and how often it should be pulled from the source.

nested_params.name: FirstExecutionFrom
nested_params.description: The start date for objects to import in the first flow run as an Unix/epoch timestamp in milliseconds or in ISO-8601 format.

nested_params.name: Object
nested_params.description: The name of the object to pull from the data source.

nested_params.name: ScheduleExpression
nested_params.description: How often the data should be pulled from data source.
